00019 void InternalSpike::ProcessEvent(Simulation * CurrentSimulation){
00020         
00021         Neuron * neuron=this->source;  // source of the spike
00022         
00023         if(neuron->GetPredictedSpike()==this->time){
00024                 
00025                 neuron->ProcessInputActivity(this);
00026                         
00027                 // Not needed for only one spike per input
00028                 neuron->GenerateAutoActivity(CurrentSimulation->GetQueue());
00029                 // Not-needed end (can be replaced by neuron->predictedspike=0)
00030                 
00031                 CurrentSimulation->WriteSpike(this);
00032                 CurrentSimulation->WritePotential(neuron->GetLastUpdate(), this->GetSource(), neuron->GetStateVarAt(1));
00033                 
00034                 //spike.time+=Net.inters[neuron->outconind].delay;
00035         neuron->GenerateOutputActivity(this,CurrentSimulation->GetQueue());
00036     }
00037 }
